name: Working Life (Ludum Dare 44)
description:
Install instructions

Controls:

Mouse and Spacebar: Make Selections/Buy Items/Press Buttons.

Objective:

Get dressed in the most expensive clothing.

Directions:

Go to Work by pressing the "Work" button and you would see your currency go up.

Once your currency reaches a certain level, you can buy the products listed on the screen.

HOWEVER, products can only be successfully purchased only if you have the required payment. OTHERWISE, the item would disappear and you would not recieve the item.

The products go up in tiers, the more times it is bought.

Tiers:

Tier I: Costs $100

Tier II: Costs $200

Tier II: Costs $300

Tier IV: Costs $400

Available Products:

Shirt, Pants, Shoes, Hat and Facewear
